GapFillInput.Title: Modals and words with similar meanings
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct word into each gap.

Content.Question:
1. I think going out for a meal would be the best idea.
2. It will be touch and go whether he’ll walk again.
3. We may well see you at the reception.
4. One poor score shouldn't make any difference to the final result.
5. He really ought to consider the consequences before he decides.
6. Surely you wouldn't sign the contract before checking the details?
7. Where’s Jessica? She’s bound to get lost.
8. You needn't bring bedding – we’ve got lots here.
9. They were supposed to call earlier.
10. You absolutely mustn't go in there. It clearly says ‘Do Not Enter’ on the door.
